Title: Form Fitting Gown with Sweeping Train

----

Colors: lavender

Category: evening

Featured-image: C224-lavender-form-fitting-gown-with-sweeping-train_p.jpg

----

Description: A form fitting gown features a sweeping train. The back of the gown has an oval cutout and sheer sides. The front of the gown is a sweetheart style with a sheer panel that is covered with sequins and beading. The front of the skirt is split in the front.
